doc.dc_title_s: Massie - 1907 - A new and historical map of Albemarle County, Virginia
doc.dc_description_s:
Author: Frank A. Massie.  Credit: Owned and published by the Virginia School Company, 1907.  UVA library call#: G3883 .A3 1907 .M3.
* Inset: Junction rail road map of Virginia, also showing relative position of Albemarle Co. in the state.
* Includes statistics for Albemarle County and Charlottesville for 1906; population figures for 1900.
* Elevation indicated by hachures.
* Contains geographic and geological features, roads, railroads, telephone lines, post offices, voting places, schools (white, colored, and high schools), churches, historic sites, and homes of many county residents.
* Additional historical notes in the map margins.
* Commonly referred to as the Massie map.
